body_html:
@simonhuber95 This sounds like a problem that's specific to your machine or installation, rather than a problem with TensorFlow. I'd suggest investigating online for msvcp140.dll problems.

E.g. this StackOverflow issue suggests downloading Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32998902/msvcp140-dll-missing

Closing this out, since there isn't much we can do on the TensorFlow side to fix this.

body:
@simonhuber95 This sounds like a problem that's specific to your machine or installation, rather than a problem with TensorFlow.  I'd suggest investigating online for `msvcp140.dll` problems.

E.g. this StackOverflow issue suggests downloading `Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015`:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32998902/msvcp140-dll-missing

Closing this out, since there isn't much we can do on the TensorFlow side to fix this.
